text: Mårten Hagström (born 27 April 1971) is a Swedish guitarist. He plays for Meshuggah, an extreme metal band. He joined the band after they released their first album. Hagström was called one of the 100 best guitarists of all time by Guitar World. Hagström has said that the way he plays guitar is inspired by bands such as Rush, Strapping Young Lad, and Metallica. == References == Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Swedish guitarists Category:Meshuggah
title: Mårten Hagström
